Pianolibrary.org is looking for contributors.

Back to Works by composer

Wolfgang Amadeus Mozart

1756–1791

Works overview · Works by difficulty · Recommended editions

[Wikipedia] · [IMSLP] · [NMA Online]

Works are identified by the catalogue of Ludwig von Köchel. When works are identified differently between catalogue editions, the earliest and latest identifications are generally both given. See also works ordered by the 1862 catalogue (KV1), the 1905 catalogue (KV2), the 1937 catalogue (KV3), the 1964 catalogue (KV6), works in the Neue Mozart-Ausgabe not in the 1964 catalogue, works in the Notebook for Nannerl, and incipits of lost works.
